sentences.en: All this helps children to develop an inquiring attitude to learning.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都有助于培养孩子好学爱问的态度。

sentences.en: Banks had increased scope to develop new financial products.
sentences.cn: 银行已为开发新的金融产品留出了更大余地。

sentences.en: Corsica has developed its economy around the tourist industry.
sentences.cn: 科西嘉岛的经济是围绕旅游业发展起来的。

sentences.en: Dark-skinned people rarely develop skin cancer.
sentences.cn: 黑皮肤的人很少得皮肤癌。

sentences.en: Did you ever get the pictures developed ?
sentences.cn: 你到底有没有把照片冲洗出来？

sentences.en: Do the emotions develop in parallel with the intellect?
sentences.cn: 情感与智力是并行发展的吗？

sentences.en: exercises to develop muscle strength
sentences.cn: 锻炼肌肉力量的运动

sentences.en: He had developed a certain affection for me.
sentences.cn: 他对我产生了一些好感。

sentences.en: How fast would the disease develop?
sentences.cn: 这种病发展得有多快?

sentences.en: Knowledge in the field of genetics has been developing very rapidly.
sentences.cn: 遗传学领域的知识发展非常迅速。

sentences.en: Membership in her church youth group helped develop her political ideas.
sentences.cn: 加入教会青年团契促使她形成了自己的政治观点。

sentences.en: Researchers are developing technology for the US military.
sentences.cn: 研究人员在为美国军方开发技术。

sentences.en: Scientists are developing new drugs to treat arthritis.
sentences.cn: 科学家正在研制治疗关节炎的新药。

sentences.en: She should have developed her own style instead of copying him.
sentences.cn: 她应该塑造自己的风格，而不是去照搬他的。

sentences.en: She won a grant to develop her own business.
sentences.cn: 她赢得了一笔拨款，用以扩展自己的企业。

sentences.en: Shell signed a contract to develop oil and gas reserves near Archangel.
sentences.cn: 壳牌石油公司签订了一份开采阿尔汉格尔附近的石油和天然气资源的合同。

sentences.en: The crucial skill you need to develop is sorting out the parents.
sentences.cn: 你需要培养的关键技能就是让那些家长认错。

sentences.en: The land was developed for low-cost housing.
sentences.cn: 这块土地被开发建造廉价住宅。

sentences.en: These clashes could develop into open warfare.
sentences.cn: 这些冲突可能会发展成为公开的战争。

sentences.en: They develop a fever and a watery discharge from their eyes.
sentences.cn: 他们开始发烧，眼睛里分泌出一种水状物。

sentences.en: They lacked the scientific personnel to develop the technical apparatus much further.
sentences.cn: 他们缺少能够进一步研发这一技术装置的科研人员。

sentences.en: We are all genetically programmed to develop certain illnesses.
sentences.cn: 基因决定了我们都会患上某些疾病。

sentences.en: We have to develop a less amateurish approach to our organisa-tions.
sentences.cn: 我们必须使我们对待自己组织的态度变得较为专业。

sentences.en: You have to develop your capabilities to the maximum.
sentences.cn: 你必须尽你所能。

words.tran_cn: 发达的（国家或地区）；成熟的
发展；开发；发育；住宅小区（专指由同一开发商开发的）；[摄] 显影
开发；进步；使成长；使显影

phrases.phrase: torch program（a plan to develop new and high technology）
phrases.tran_cn: 火炬计划（开发高新科技的一项计划）

trans.tran_cn: 成长，发展，出现，开发，研制，养成习惯，获得(名声)，患病，开始侵袭/影响，加强，发挥，修建，阐释，冲洗(胶片)
trans.tran_en: to grow or change into something bigger, stronger, or more advanced, or to make someone or something do this
